text: The Bow of Loren is strung with the hair of Elf maids and enchanted with potent charms for increased power.
Sceolan carries a buckler instead of an ordinary shield. This is a small shield with a spiked front, the spikes are arranged in an arcane pattern
Ulthuan's Great Eagles are the firm allies of the Elves, fighting their causes since the coming of Chaos.
The eldest, most powerful Dragons can destroy entire units with a molten blast of their white-hot breath.
